mapper.insert: insert into review(review_serial, member_id, place_serial, review_type, reputation, review_title, review_content, visit_date, review_date, service, cleanliness, accessibility, price, scale, food) values(seq_review.nextval, #{member_id}, #{place_serial}, #{review_type}, #{reputation}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, sysdate-${visit_date}, sysdate, #{service}, #{cleanliness}, #{accessibility}, #{price}, #{scale}, #{food})
